oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Fran Rajotte Oral History Interview, 2011 August 26
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Fran Rajotte, conducted on August 26, 2011 by Luke Herbst as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Rajotte discusses her experiences during the May 2010 floods.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rajotte, Fran--Interviews
Publix Super Markets
